home.description: An open source HTTP client using Ajax and promises written in TypeScript.

about.text:
The main purpose of this library is to provide a simple tool for sending asynchronous HTTP (Ajax) request.

You can help develop Aias.js on Github.

code.p1: Instantiate a Keyboard class and creates input listeners.

contact.description: Feel free to ask me about my work, give me suggestions, or just to say hi.
